name: Break Time!
description: Break Time! is a physics based destruction game for Virtual Reality.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) Processor: 3.0GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti / GTX 960 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Only works in VR!
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
